I'm the co-founder of Float.com. We're the resource scheduling app that helps teams keep track of who's working on what and when. We're bootstrapped, profitable and 100% remote.

We're currently growing our engineering and marketing team, with three roles currently open:

- Backend Engineer - Senior Engineer with a focus on integrations - Digital Marketing Manager

If you're interested or know someone that might be, send them this way to apply: https://floatjobs.workable.com/

Thanks.
